    Method

    Command
    CommandFactory.getCommand(String commandName)

    The RemoveTariffCommand class implements the Command interface and removes a tariff.

    The class implements the Command interface.

    ViewSubscriberProfileCommand is a concrete implementation of Command interface.
    class 
    ViewSubscriberTariffsCommand
    The ViewSubscriberTariffsCommand class implements the Command interface and is used to retrieve the list of tariffs that a particular subscriber with the days left until their next payment.
